DOC.detailed_description: Rationale : The Gore IBE device newly design iliac branch device , use combination widely accept C3 Excluder endograft exclusion common iliac aneurysms aorto-iliac aneurysm . The late proven safety efficacy exclude abdominal aortic aneurysm . The Gore IBE device get CE mark October 2013 . Objective design : This investigator-initiated post market registry consist retrospective prospective part . The first part retrospective registry implant IBE device Gore Netherlands CE mark obtain , get initial insight feasibility safety procedure . The second part prospectively register data implant IBE Gore device , order gain robust data efficacy device maintain hypogastric artery patency . Study population : All patient Gore IBE implant .
